#include <iostream>
#include <cstring>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	while(1){
		char a[10],b[10];
		cin >> a >> b;
		if(strcmp(a,"0") == 0 && strcmp(b,"0") == 0){
			break;
		}
		int count = 0, carry = 0;
		int i = strlen(a)-1;
		int j = strlen(b)-1;
		while(i >= 0 || j >=0){
			int sum =0;
		    if(i>=0){
				sum = sum + a[i] - '0';
				i--;
		    }
		    if(j>=0){
		    	sum = sum + b[j] -'0';
		    	j--;
		    }
		    sum = sum + carry;
		    if(sum >= 10){
		    	carry = 1;
		    	count++;
		    }
		    else
		    	carry = 0;
		    
		}
		if(count  == 0)
			cout << "No carry operation." << endl;
		else if(count == 1)
			cout << "1 carry operation." << endl;
		else
			cout << count << " carry operations." << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
